summary: When a New Orleans merchant ship captain finds his father's sister ship derelict at sea, he investigates the crew's mysterious disappearance amid rumors of a smuggled gold cargo.

O'Brien|Jimmy O'Gatty|Jack Overman|Jack Perrin|Theodore Rand|Joey Ray|Al Rhein|Jason Robards Sr.|O.M. Steiger|Charles Sullivan|Sailor Vincent|Bryant Washburn|Bill Williams|Chili Williams
keywords: gold shipment|purposely sinking a ship|ship's crew|father daughter relationship|reference to cinderella
title: Capitán Ángel
